info.title: GoFreight API Documentation
info.description:
The GoFreight API enables you to programmatically interact with data inside your GoFreight system.
You can use the APIs to create new applications or integrate with existing applications.

tags.name: Webhooks
tags.description:
GoFreight Webhooks allow you to subscribe to events happening in your GoFreight system.
Whenever an event is triggered, GoFreight will send a HTTP POST request to the callback URL you specified.
You can use webhooks to integrate with other systems or build your own applications.

Please checkout our [Webhooks Integration Guide](https://developers.gofreight.com/docs/webhooks/) for more information.

parameters.name: type[]
parameters.description:
Array of trade partner types (e.g., `type[]=CS&type[]=VR`).<details><summary>Click to check the enum definitions</summary>


|Value|Description|
|:-:|:-:|
|`null`|NONE|
|`CS`|CUSTOMER|
|`CR`|OCEAN_CARRIER|
|`AC`|AIR_CARRIER|
|`CF`|CFS|
|`CY`|CY|
|`EM`|EMPLOYEE|
|`FR`|FORWARDER|
|`GV`|GOVERNMENT|
|`MF`|MANUFACTURER|
|`OE`|OFFICE_EXPENSE|
|`PR`|OVERSEA_AGENT|
|`CB`|CUSTOMS_BROKER|
|`TK`|TRUCKER|
|`RC`|RAIL_COMPANY|
|`WH`|WAREHOUSE|
|`BK`|BANK|
|`OT`|OTHERS|
|`TM`|TERMINAL|
|`KS`|SHIPPER_KNOWN|
|`SH`|SHIPPER_UNKNOWN|
|`RL`|RAMP_LOCATION|
|`CN`|CONSIGNEE|
|`VR`|VENDOR|
|`BW`|BOOKING_WINDOW|
|`FB`|FBA_WAREHOUSE|

</details>

parameters.name: office_ref
parameters.description: The reference of the office that the trade partner assigned to. This parameter is functional only when "TP by office" feature is enabled (contact Customer Support for details).

parameters.name: is_light_created
parameters.description: Is light-created TP or not. (e.g., is_light_created=false)

parameters.name: is_active
parameters.description: Is active TP or not. (e.g., is_active=true)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number (e.g., page=1)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items per page (e.g., limit=10)

parameters.description: The date for which the currency exchange rate is applicable. If not provided, the current date is used.

parameters.name: office_ref

sample.summary: Example of an office reference ID.

parameters.description: Reference ID for the office. This field is optional and only required if accounting by office is enable. When accounting by office is disabled, this field can be omitted.

|`EX`|EXPENSE|

</details>

group_type.description:
General Ledger's group type<details><summary>Click to check the enum definitions</summary>


|Value|Description|
|:-:|:-:|
|`AS01`|CURRENT ASSET|
|`AS02`|FIXED ASSET|
|`AS03`|INVESTMENT ASSET|
|`AS04`|OTHER ASSET|
|`LI01`|CURRENT LIABILITY|
|`LI02`|LONGTERM LIABILITY|
|`LI03`|OTHER LIABILITY|
|`EQ01`|CAPITAL STOCK|
|`EQ02`|RETAINED EARNING|
|`EQ03`|NET INCOME|
|`EQ04`|SHARE HOLDER'S EQUITY|
|`IN01`|AIR EXPORT INCOME|
|`IN02`|AIR IMPORT INCOME|
|`IN03`|OCEAN EXPORT INCOME|
|`IN04`|OCEAN IMPORT INCOME|
|`IN05`|WAREHOUSE INCOME|
|`CO01`|AIR EXPORT COST|
|`CO02`|AIR IMPORT COST|
|`CO03`|OCEAN EXPORT COST|
|`CO04`|OCEAN IMPORT COST|
|`CO05`|WAREHOUSE COST|
|`CO06`|OTHER COST|
|`EX01`|EXPENSE|
|`EX02`|ADMINISTRATIVE EXPENSE|
|`OI01`|OTHER INCOME|
|`OE01`|OTHER EXPENSE|
|`IT01`|INCOME TAX|
|`IN06`|INCOME OTHER|
|`IN7`|DOMESTIC INCOME|
|`CO7`|DOMESTIC COST|

</details>

ref.description: The ID of the webhook subscription

callback_url.description: The callback URL of the subscription

event_types.description: The list of event types that the subscription will be triggered on. `null` indicates that it subscribes to all event types.

enabled.description: The flag that indicates if the subscription is enabled

created_at.description: The created time of the webhook subscription

updated_at.description: The latest updated time of the subscription

callback_url.description: The URL that the GoFreight events will be posted to

event_types.description:
The list of event types that the subscription will be triggered on. Not specifying this field or giving an empty list or null will subscribe to all event types.

Please note that the event type `INVOICE_BLOCK_STATUS_UPDATED` is deprecated and will be removed in the future. Instead, please subscribe to `INVOICE_BLOCKED` and `INVOICE_UNBLOCKED` and fetch the invoice data via API.

enabled.description: The flag that indicates if the subscription is enabled

created_at.description: The created time of the webhook subscription

updated_at.description: The latest updated time of the subscription

parameters.description: The ID of the webhook subscription

callback_url.description: The URL that the GoFreight events will be posted to

event_types.description:
The list of event types that the subscription will be triggered on. Giving an empty list or null will subscribe to all event types.

Please note that the event type `INVOICE_BLOCK_STATUS_UPDATED` is deprecated and will be removed in the future. Instead, please subscribe to `INVOICE_BLOCKED` and `INVOICE_UNBLOCKED` and fetch the invoice data via API.

enabled.description: The flag that indicates if the subscription is enabled
